actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A resolution disapproving the proposed realignment of the Aerospace Defense Command of the Air Force transmitted to the Committee on Armed Services by the Secretary of the Air Force on March 29, 1979.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives to the proposed realignment of the Aerospace Defense Command of the Air Force transmitted to the Committee on Armed Services by the Secretary of the Air Force.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the proposed realignment of the Aerospace Defense Command of the Air Force transmitted to the Committee on Armed Services by the Secretary of the Air Force on March 29, 1979.
